objects.text:
• X-Trans CMOS sensor for stunning images
• Advanced autofocus system
• Versatile interchangeable lens system
LIMITED TIME OFFER - SEIZE THE MOMENT

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Easy
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with bright XF lens mount
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting adjustments
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for accurate image composition
• Durable black metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Advanced autofocus system for fast and accurate focusing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens collection
• Perfect balance of professional features and user-friendly operation
• Ideal for both enthusiast photographers and professionals

banner_details:
This modern tech banner features a sleek and professional layout promoting a high-end camera. The left half has a dark, split-toned background—deep blue and almost-black—with geometric red accents on the top-left and bottom-right corners. Prominently placed at the top, the heading text (`heading`) introduces the camera model in a bold futuristic font. Below it, the tagline (`tagline`) appears in vibrant orange to draw attention to its professional appeal. The description (`description`) lists product highlights using bullet points in smaller white text. Price (`price`) appears large and bold midway down, followed by an offer text (`offer_text`) in small uppercase font. A bold call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`) in white on bright orange invites user engagement. The right half features the product image (`product_image`) neatly aligned on a darker background with subtle transparent circular accents for depth.  

Color Palette:
- Deep Navy: `#1A2A36`  
- Near Black: `#0F1921`  
- Bright Orange: `#FF4D2E`  
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Light Gray (accents/lines): Transparent white strokes
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek and professional color palette dominated by deep black (#000000) and charcoal gray (#2E2E2E), giving it a premium and durable look. Metallic silver (#C0C0C0) accentuates the dials and text, offering contrast and high readability, while vibrant hints of red (#FF4C4C) and orange (#FFA500) on the lens markings draw attention to functional details. The lens glass subtly reflects blues and greens (#5BC8AD, #6BA4FF), adding a dynamic visual touch. For an ad banner, use a background of matte black or gradient gray, highlighting these pops of color for a high-tech, modern appeal.
